[i]Dark Schemer[/i] – Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a a player, that creature connives.
[i]Unrelenting Tricks[/i] – Whenever you discard one or more land cards, Narcian, Conniving Wyvern General deals 1 damage to target opponent. If this is the third time this ability has resolved, each opponent discards a card.
